verbs.description: WASHINGTON — [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: says] [ARG1: his wife is " doing great " nearly two weeks after kidney treatment] . President Trump answered a reporter 's question about the first lady as he departed the White House on Friday for a trip to the U.S. Naval Academy graduation in Annapolis , Maryland .
